lyrics.text: I stay up and get busy
you oppressed me with you but I can't forget you
look how many years have passed
where are the days that we spent with dreams
what sill happen to us if we repeated them?
and if we sang together in the paradise of love
you oppressed me with you but I can't forget you, look how many years have passed
oh you who is keeping my mind busy, who made you become harsh on me?
oh you who abandoned me, why would you forget me?
the distant is tiring and the nearness is the happiness
you oppressed me with you but I can't forget you, look how many years have passed

englishTranslations.title: I Stay Up and Get Busy

lyrics.text: ظالمني معاك ومش بنساك شوف كم سنة

ظالمني معاك ومش بنساك شوف كم سنة
My love's house is excellently aired!
My love's bottle is full of water and I'm thirsty
Would I ask him for a sip or stop behaving naughty and go to home
When he saw me passing by him, he lifted my scarf and watered me
But his scarf hurt my eye softly
I like when my gossipers blame on me!
My darling and I are extremely sweet!
I dream.. I sing to my darling
I have no special one, I'm waiting for my destined one.
I wish someday my destiny would make up with me
And I'd say from the bottom of my heart

I'm in love with the sea
I'm in love with the sea
I'm in love with the sea...
I'm in love with the sky,
Sometimes with eyes full of songs,
I'm in love with the sky...
I'm in love with the road,
Because we met on the road.
I'm in love with the sea,
I'm in love wiht the sky,
And I'm in love with the road,

englishTranslations.title: I'm in love with the sea

lyrics.text: It's tender like you, my darling
And sometimes it's crazy like you
And sometimes it's a neighbour like you
And sometimes it's upset like you
And sometimes it's so full of silence
And a lover and a stranger
And sometimes it's close like you
And we were happy and miserable
And in it our tears had laughed
And in it our candles cried
And the friend in it was lost

englishTranslations.title: I LOVE THE SEA LIKE CRAZY

lyrics.text: I Do Love The Sea Like Crazy
It's tender like you, my darling
And sometimes it's crazy like you
And sometimes it's a neighbor like you
And sometimes it's upset like you
And sometimes it's so full of silence
And a lover and a stranger
And sometimes it's close like you
Because in it we met - Pentru că pe ea ne
And we were happy and miserable
And in it our tear's had laughed
And in it our candle's cried
And the friend in it was lost
it's gentle like u, my love
and sometimes it's crazy like u
and sometimes it's confused like u
and sometimes it's upset like u
and sometimes it's filled with patience like u
And sometimes it's near like u
Because our meetings are in it
And our happiness and our misery
And our tears laughed in it
And our candles cried in it
And the friend was lost in it
It's tender like you, my darling
And sometimes it's crazy like you
And sometimes it's a neighbor like you
And sometimes it's upset like you
And sometimes it's so full of silence
And a lover and a stranger
And sometimes it's close like you
And we were happy and miserable
And in it our tear's had laughed
And in it our candle's cried
And the friend in it was lost

englishTranslations.title: I Do Love The Ocean Like Crazy

lyrics.text: i adore the sea ,it is as tender as you my love
and sometimes it is like you crazy and traveling and migrating
and some sometimes like you wondering and sometimes like you sad
and sometimes it's filled with silence i adore the sea
i adore the heaven because it is like you forgiving filled with stars and happiness
and it is like you sometimes far sometimes near
with you melody eyes i adore the heaven
i adore the road because it is where we met
*our happiness hardness our friends our youth
and in it our tear laughed and our candles cried
and we lost the friend in it i adore the road
i adore the see and the heaven
and i adore the road becasue the are all life
وانتى يا حبيبتى انتى كل الحياة
Every precious is worthless except you...
and my smiles and my pains are from you [because of you]..
and the one whom I love in my life is you..
my heart and soul are in a nonexistent world..
and when you're away...I lose my world and my existence
Nothing sweet in my memories but you...
and the one who keeps me up at night is you...
I lived my days and my dreams in your love
My all dream is to live the rest of my life with you...
Every second in my life tells you..I love you
From my heart I wish I have a place in your heart
My whole day is with you..seeing you or waiting for you
or searching about you or finding you..
every precious is worthless except you
and the only one whom i love in my life is you.
فيها ايه الدنيا دية ... إلا انت؟
كل غالي يهون علي ... إلا انت
واللي حبيته في حياتي هو انت
وإن غبت عني ... أحس اني لا ليا دنيا ولا وجود
إيه حياتي كلها من غيرك انت ؟
ذكرياتي فيها ايه حلو إلا انت؟
و اللي بسهر له ليلاتي برضه انت
واللي حبيته في حياتي هو انت
كل ثانية في عمري بتقولك بحبك
كل قلبي لك ياريت لي مكان في قلبك
طول ليلي ونهاري معاك ... يابشوفك يابستناك
فيها ايه الدنيا دية ... إلا انت؟
كل غالي يهون عليا ... إلا انت
واللي حبيته في حياتي هو انت
The close one to you is far, and the far from you is close.
All of that and still, my heart which loved you still calls you its love
The love of my eyes, love of my dreams,
love of my tears, and joy of my days
Do I mean so little to you, that I stay awake with my pain,
and the stars of the night become lost in my darkness.
O you who are going to the one, who has abandoned my sleepless eyes and is unaware
I ask you, describe for him my tears flowing all day and night
Oh, me - Oh, you - all of that and my heart which loved you still calls you its love
Do you remember, or have you forgotten... how often I used to suffer?
Even in those sweets days when I used to meet you,
I used to miss the joy I had with you even before their nights came.
I was still in love still learning anew.
I had not know that the close one to you is far.
O you who are going to the one, who has abandoned my sleepless eyes and is unaware
I ask you, describe for him the my tears flowing all day and night
Oh, me - Oh, you - all of that and my heart which loved you still calls you its love
You who your distance is more bitter than your meeting.
You who your abandonment is more bitter than your satisfaction.
How desolated I feel whilst you are far from me.
How desolated I feel whilst you are close to me.
O Love - what do I say to him? ... O Love - why should I forgive him?
For it is the anguish that should forgive him,
and my sleeplessness is what should forgive him,
and my tears are what should forgive him.
O you who are going to the one, who has abandoned my sleepless eyes and is unaware
I ask you, describe for him the my tears flowing all day and night
Oh, me - Oh, you - all of that and my heart which loved you still calls you its love

englishTranslations.title: The close one to you is far

lyrics.text: القريب منك بعيد .. والبعيد عنك قريب
كل ده وقلبي اللي حبك لسه بيسميك حبيب
يا رايح للي فايتلي عيوني سهرانة ولا داري
أمانة اوصفله دمع عيوني طول ليلي ونهاري
آه مني آه منك .. كل ده وقلبي اللي حبك
فاكر ولا ناسي .. ياما كنت بقاسي
حتى مع الايام الحلوة .. وقت ما كنت بقابلك فيها
كانت الفرحة معاك توحشني قبل ما يجي معاد لياليها
كنت لسه في الحب لسه بتعلم جديد
ما كنتش اعرف ان القريب منك بعيد
يا رايح للي فايتلي عيوني سهرانة ولا داري
أمانة اوصفله دمع عيوني طول ليلي ونهاري
آه مني آه منك .. كل ده وقلبي اللي حبك
يا حب اقوله ايه .. يا حب اسامحه ليه
يا رايح للي فايتلي عيوني سهرانة ولا داري
أمانة اوصف له دمع عيوني طول ليلي ونهاري
آه مني آه منك .. كل ده وقلبي اللي حبك
I dream with you .. of a ship
and a harbour .. to anchor us
the wind resists ..and i found you
in your eyes .. and your hands
as long as you're .. in the journey with me
my name and your name .. my dear
as long as you're .. in the journey with me
When I see you beside me I can not hide anything
I cry for the joy of my heart
You, my eyes light , the increased sadness withered my eyelids,Absence is too long
I'm  occupied with your spectrum,I meet it everywhere
When I want to hug it ,I find it  mere delusions
Your cruelty is very hard for me ,have some mercy on me
I made my longing patient for your absence .My hope was to keep your promise
you desired your habits ,and occupied my mind
Day and night ,from my increased fire , I m patient and I hide my feeling and I stop high hopes
I forgot my loved ones and I gave  you  a blossom of my youth
And I picked it, why do you give me up?
Does this satisfy you ?Does this satisfy you ?
You leave me,  but I love you
You play with me I love you ,You forget me I love you
When I see you beside me I can not hide anything
I cry for the joy of my heart
You, my eyes light , the increased sadness withered my eyelids ,Absence is too long

englishTranslations.title: When I See you Beside me

ساعة ما بشوفك جنبي ما اقدرش أدراي وأخبي
يانور عيوني زادت شجوني دبل جفوني
طيفك دا تملي شاغلني ماأطرح ما أروح يقابلني

صبرت الشوق على بعدك كان أملي تحفظ عهدك
ليل نهاري من كتر ناري أصبر وأداري

تلاوعني برضه أحبك تنساني برضه أحبك
ساعة ما بشوفك جنبي ما اقدرش أدراي وأخبي
يانور عيوني زادت شجوني دبل جفوني
For my whole life i will love you and complain to you and complain to the aunt and the aunt
I will no longer meet you or tell you dor your love has left me in such a condition
Why does my heart ask about yours
Aslo, why are you bieng cold with me when i love you
I've been twisted by jealousy and it left me wondering
You made me forget my existence
And I'll send you a message in the morning
Hour after hour I'm waiting for you to come but you don't
For you I loved the world and without you how can I live
Why do you always forget and become so cruel
This isn't fare, the one who forgot me, haram
About your love I've said so many things
And tears are falling from my eyes
I'll keep my sweet words from you so that you meet me and I tell you
Not for a day have I been on your mind but you won't leave mine
What should l do, just what should l do
In my eyes l keep you I can't cheat you
And I've kept the complaint in my heart

طول عمري أحبك واشكي لك واشكي للعمة وللخالة
حرمت أقابلك واحكي لك ده غرامك خلاني ف حالة
إش معنى أنا قلبي بيسأل على قلبك ولا تسألش
إش معنى كمان إنتَ بتتقل وانا أحبك ولا أتقلش
بتفوت الساعة ورا التانية واستنى تجيني ولا تجيش
على شانك حبيت الدنيا وازاي من غيرك أنا اعيش
ليه دايماً تنسى ليه بس بتقسى
ده مش اسمه كلام يا ناسيني حرام
الكلمة الحلوة أشيلها لك علشان تقابلني واقولها لك
ولا يوم خليتني أشغل بالك ولا عايز تحرمني خيالك
وانا أعمل إيه بس أعمل إيه
في عينيَّ بصونك مش هاين أخونك
Eyes of the heart are awake, they don't sleep
I am not awake, nor asleep, I can't
The night passes, passes over my restless eyelashes
And my eyelashes have not tasted sleep
While his eyes are indulging in sleep
On you is the most beautiful smile
When he says hello to me
After every word I want to
He told me one day "Baby, take the moon"
And I went with him, but he gave me nothing but sleepless nights
You tell me things and I get so happy
I leave sleep and think of you
You talk and then you walk away
And I stay up, I can't sleep
Oh you, who sleeps so soundly..
You've kept me up, my darling
I loved you dear, without asking any questions
And I will stay up dear, as long as the nights stretch
The only thing confusing me and keeping me from sleep..
Is how I can stay up all night and how you can sleep
And I tell him sweetheart, everything in you sweetheart, is a dream
Your voice is a dream, your heart is a dream
And although you tire me out and I stay up for you
The restless nights from you are a dream

انا صاحيا ولا نايمة ما بقدرشي
يبات الليل يبات سهران على رمشي
روح يا نوم من عين حبيبي
ده قالي في يوم يا حبيبتي خدي القمر
ورحت معاه وما اداني الا السهر
حبيتك يا حبيبي من غير ما أسأل سؤال
وحسهر يا حبيبي مهما طال المطال
انا بس اللي محيرني وما خلانيش انام
ازاي انا بقدر اسهر وازاي تقدر تنام
واقولوا حبيبي كل ما فيك حبيبي وحلم
And here we are, we're the same
If we had lived even one happy day
Our wounds would have been worth it
Darling, you always like to say words
If words healed, then why do I feel pain?
When it comes to blame, I've blamed you till I melted
Neither did my heart's wound heal nor did you call it quits
And the tenderness of your words makes me return
And I call my heart's wound a liar and believe your promises
Where do you get your words? Such attractive pretty words
They made me say to my pain: "Oh pain, why are you a liar?"
Your lies are weird and they took me away to happy dreams many times
And I'm scared to walk my path and find myself returning alone

حبيبي انت غاوي دايما تقول كلام
لو الكلام بيداوي ليه حاسه بآلام
ان كان علي العتاب عاتبتك لما دوبت
لا جرح قلبي طاب حبيبي ولا انت توبت
منين بتجيب كلامك كلام جميل بيعجب
خلاني أقول لجرحي يا جرح ليه بتكدب
كدبك غريب واياما خدني لأحلام سعيدة
وأخاف أمشي في طريقي وأرجع منه وحيدة
I keep calling for you for one day and two days
And all lovers have one world, but we have two
بتسافر ليالي وترجع كل فين وفين
وإن حتي أفتكرت بتسأل كل فين وفين
Oh you're the one who let the years (age) blame me for staying awake, staying awake which melted me (made me ill)
(you're the one who let)and the moon (her love) that comes to me for one night and desert me for many others
since the day longing bid farewell us, hearts stopped listening to us
as if I started to get used to the coincidences that agather us
Even many years of my life was lost, I've never get med of you
and even staying away for so long can't make me forget, even staying awake for many nights is out of my hands
I'm not strog as life (time) nor its confusion (to endure staying away from him), not even strong enough to endure separation and its course
I blame you meanwhile my heart misses you, I need your being beside me
I'm calling u for a day and two days
And every couple has a world and we r in two worlds
U travel for nights and u come back every now and then
And even if u remember you ask every now and then
Why am I hearing your answer
You who made the years blame me for staying awake at night that pines me away
And the moon that comes to me for a night and left me for the rest of nights
Since the day the longing left us, the hearts haven't heard us
As if I get used that the coincidences gather us
Why am I hearing your answer
As much I've lost from my life, I've never quarrel with ur time
and neither the long of the separation makes me forget nor staying up at night is up to me
I can't stand the time and its confusion and I can't stand the separation or its mention
I blame u and the sorrow of my heart needs u beside me
Why am I hearing your answer

englishTranslations.title: every now and then / from time to time

lyrics.text: walikull alhabayib dunya wa'ahna f ddnniatin
batasafur layali watarjae kl fyn wafin
wa'ann hatti 'aftakirt bitas'al kl fyn wafin
ya mukhalli alssinin taetibni e alssahr ally bidubny
walqamar 'iilay laylat yajini wabaqiat allyaly saybny
min yawm ma alhunin wadaena ma biqatsh alqulub tasamaeuna
wakany budit attaeud ealay 'an alssadaf tajammaena
eali qad ally dae min eumri ma khsmtsh zamanuk eumri
wala tul alfiraq binasi wala sahr allyaly bi'amri
lana qad alzzaman walahiratuh walaqid alfiraq walasiratih
wabieatibik walihfat qalbi muhtajat liwujudik janabi
ولكل الحبايب دنيا وأحنا ف دنيتين
بتسافر ليالي وترجع كل فين وفين
وأن حتي أفتكرت بتسأل كل فين وفين
يا مخلي السنين تعتبني ع السهر اللي بيدوبني
والقمر الي ليلة يجيني وبقية الليالي سايبني
من يوم ما الحنين ودعنا ما بقتش القلوب تسمعنا
وكأني بديت اتعود علي ان الصدف تجمعنا
علي قد اللي ضاع من عمري ما خصمتش زمانك عمري
ولا طول الفراق بينسي ولا سهر الليالي بأمري
لانا قد الزمان ولاحيرته ولاقد الفراق ولاسيرته
وبعاتبك ولهفة قلبي محتاجة لوجودك جنبي
Stop crying cause I heated crying
How can brave tears be so weak ..when they come
you challenge the yearning by kisses..
That blister me with a knout of fire
And the doubts come out of my head ..blaming
cause I blessed all your lies
What can I say to the tears that missing you spilled them
What can I say to the ribs that I ripped frightening on you
Would I say they were cheap?
Would I say they betrayed me?
If I say it ..it will relief me
No I will not say it. you say
Do not be afraid of me
You saved me from the false of my dreams
ً I saw that you were my band that I worrked all my life not to break
You were my guilt that I asked god not to forgive
be as you want to be
Cause I made you from my love and my madness
And I am cured from love and from madness.
ما أهون الدمع الجسور إذا جرى
ماذا أقول لأدمع ٍ سفحتها أشواقي إليك ؟؟؟
ماذا اقول لأضلع ٍ مزقتها خوفا عليكِ ؟؟؟
فرأيت أنكِ كنتِ لي قيد ا حرصتُ العمرَ ألا أكسره
ورأيتُ أنكِ كنتِ لي ذنباً سألتُ اللهَ ألا يغفره
فأنا صنعتك من هوايَ ، ومن جنوني
ولقد برئتُ من الهوى ومن الجنون
What shall I tell him if he came asking
If I'm loving him or if I'm hating him?
What shall I say if his fingers started
To braid and caress the night-dark hair of mine?
How would I let him bring his chair closer
And to lay his arms over my lap?
Tomorrow, once he comes, I will hand him back his letters
And we will feed fire the best of what we had ever written
My love!1 Am I really his love?
Should I believe his claim after such parting?
Didn't my story with him end years ago?
Didn't his memory die like threads of sun (rays) do?
Didn't we break the cups of love long ago
How can we cry after what we have broken?
Oh, God! Such trifles of his are torturing me
How can I escape them? Oh, God!
Here is his newspaper carelessly thrown around the corner
Here is a book that we once read together
On the armchairs some of his cigarettes can be found
And at every corner some of his leftovers are left
Why do I look at the mirror asking
In which dress shall I meet him?
Am I claiming that I hate him now?
How can I hate who dwells in my eyes?
How can I escape him? He is my destiny
I love him. I don't know what do I exactly love in him
Even his sins for me stopped being sins
Love on Earth is an imaginary fantasy
Yet, wasn't it on Earth, we would have it invented
What shall I tell him if he came asking
If I'm loving him? I love him even thousand times more
ماذا أقول له لو جاء يسألني..
إن كنت أكرهه أو كنت أهواه؟
أما انتهت من سنين قصتي معه؟
أما كسرنا كؤوس الحب من زمن
ما لي أحدق في المرآة .. أسألها
وكيف أكره من في الجفن سكناه؟
أحبه .. لست أدري ما أحب به
الحب في الأرض . بعض من تخلينا
ماذا أقول له لو جاء يسألني
إن كنت أهواه. إني ألف أهواه..
When will you know how much I love you ,my hope (originally in the poem: my man) that I'd give up on the world for it (him)
(originally: you're who I challenged in his love cities & I'm gonna keep challenging them)
If you wish to have a sea
I'd pour it in your eyes
If you wish to have a sun
I'd put it in your hands
I write it on the clouds
And I talk about it to the birds & the trees
I draw it on the water and
I water it to the cups
O sword! That sheds my blood
O story! That I don't know its title)
Because the one who started a fairytale is the one who should put an end to it
And the one who opened the doors is the one who should close them
And the one who agitated the fire is the one who should turn it out.
You think in silence (you smoke in silence) and leave me in the sea lifting my anchor & throwing it
(Don't you see me in the sea of love drowning and the waves chewing my hopes & throwing them up)
(Get down of the eyelashes,O man! You're still killing my dreams & reviving them)
Stop playing role of the lovers with me.
Stop choosing words you don't mean them.
(How many letters I have created that you may send them
and how much the flowers that you may present them to me comforted me)
(So often I have went to dates that  you may take me to
And dreamed of buying new dresses)
How many times I wrote letters from you
How many times the flowers that you presented to me comforted me
How many times I went to never happened dates
How many times I bought never having bracelets
And how many times I have wished that you may invite me to dance with you..
And I got confused where should I put my arms...
The earth has stopped to moving
As if the earth has freed itself from the times.
Without you, I don't wear necklaces.
Or my hand would touch the perfumes bottles.
To whom my youth is belonged (my beauty)
For whom I'm gonna taking off my silk veil
For whom I'm gonna unfolding my long braids.
I'm not alive ,if you aren't in my life
متى ستعرف كم اهواك يا املا
ابيع من اجله الدنيا وما فيها
لو تطلب البحر فى عينيك اسكبه
او تطلب الشمس فى كفيك ارميها
يامن يفكر فى صمت ويتركنى فى البحر
وكم خلفت لوعد لا وجود له
أرجع الى فبعدك لا عقد اعلقه
أرجع كما انت صحو كنت او مطرا
فما حياتى انا ان لم تكن فيها
Oh solo traveler and the passenger by me you left me with a thoughtful mind
You left me without a goodbye ,and my heart  has surrended for the fact of your absence.
But the tears in my eyes speaks .
On the fire of longing I’ll be waiting
So with my heart I’ll patiently wait and wish till you come back and and relief
Greed me with your nearest and promise me .
I’m afraid the foreignness be sweet to you and the distance changes you
Keep me always on mind you solo traveler and passer by me
Whatever your  distance will take ,my heart never change ,I’ll remember you more than before.and you shalll not keep me in your mind
Why do you leave me, and occupy my thoughts?
You left without a word, though my heart had much to say,
as did the tears in my eyes.
In the fire of desire I will wait
And be patient with my heart, and hope,
until your return, when it can rejoice,
That estrangement might be sweet for you
And that the distance changes you, my love,
May I always be on your mind, lone traveler
No matter how far the distance between us
I will think of you forever
Why are you leaving me and preoccupying me
You said good by with barely a "salaam"
This eyes of mine's tears speak
In the fire of desire I will wait
And be patient with my heart and hope
Though you don't come to me I am happy
Make me desirous in your presence and promise me
I'm afraid that the estrangment might be sweet for you
And that the distance changes your conditions
May I always be on your mind
No matter how long the distance between us
But first just you must keep thinking of me
And its life is rife with victories
My homeland grows and becomes free
Oh my homeland, your love rules my heart
My homeland, the homeland of all Arabic people
You are the one who called for the ultimate unity
After seeing the beauty of the revolution
Sweet is the glory filling our hearts
Sweet is the victory cladding our flag
It is the sweetest melody in our lives
Oh, It's a melody flowing between two oceans
there's the same song of the most beautiful unity
The unity of all Arab people
Our national unity that we are protecting
The one that our lives light as candles around it,
is a paradise smiling upon whoever is peaceful
And a hell unleashed upon its enemies
Go see Beirut after the attacks
Where is the occupation and oppression?
The people became abler and their power increased
And the story of Port Said repeated itself
The Arab nations lived and were victorious
Oh my homeland, the most precious homeland in the world
My homeland, you are a castle of freedom
You are the one that builds with those who build
And the one that tears down oppression
Your voice is free and Arabic
with no Eastern nor Western echos
Your dirt is fit to be eyeliner for my eyes
The fragrance of your air is my rebirth
Oh my homeland, you are a revolution against their occupation
Fill your islands with fire, destroy them
If we are all martyred upon your lands
The rocks of our mountains will fight them
Occupation will end by our hands
Its time in this world is up and done
Not in Algeria, Not in Oman,
Will the revolution fade in the face of oppression
until the triumph of the Arabic people.
Oh, my homeland, you are a paradise that people envy
And you are protecting it for the good of the world
Raise the dam2 up high and reap its goods
Produce, plant and build with its light
Your elevation is worship in our heart
You are a homeland whose life is full of sovereignty
Oh my homeland, you crawl towards your victories
Your life is a life of glory
In Palestine and our revolting South,
We are a homeland that protects and does not threaten
A homeland that preserves and does not waste
حلو يا مجد يا مالي قلوبنـا
حلو  يا نصر يا كاسي رايتنا
حلو يا احلى نغم في حــياتنا
وطني يا اغلى وطن في الدنيا
راح م الدنيا زمانه و وقته
لا في الجزائر ولا في عمان
